data.title: 357th Prakash Purb Of Dasmesh Pita Sri Guru Gobind Singh Ji Ad
data.meta_description: View 357th Prakash Purb Of Dasmesh Pita Sri Guru Gobind Singh Ji Ad. This Ad is from collection of Newspaper Sample Ads at Advert Gallery.
data.text:
Bhagwant Singh Mann

Chief Minister, Punjab

greets one and all on

357th Prakash Purb of

Dasmesh Pita

Sri Guru Gobind Singh Ji

A divine messenger and a warrior,

who initiated the Khalsa Panth

Guru Gobind Singh ji was the tenth Sikh Guru and a significant figure in Sikh history. He was born in 1666 in Patna, India, and became Guru at the age of nine after the martyrdom of his father, Guru Tegh Bahadur ji. Guru Gobind Singh ji played a crucial role in shaping the Sikh community and promoting the principles of equality, justice, and bravery.
